thread.title: Farrah Abraham Bought Herself An Engagement Ring, As One Does
thread.title_full: Farrah Abraham Bought Herself An Engagement Ring, As One Does

author: Michael Hafford
title: Farrah Abraham Bought Herself An Engagement Ring, As One Does
text: January 13, 2017 , 12:45 AM Teen Mom OG star Farrah Abraham bought herself an engagement ring. When we last heard from her, Abraham was involved in a fracas at the Teen Mom OG reunion . Now, Entertainment Tonight points out that she's rocking a 14-carat diamond ring she bought herself that then-boyfriend Simon Saran was supposed to reimburse her for.She bought the ring on while on a cruise to the Bahamas. Her daughter, Sophia, selected the rock. "It's was $64,000 initially, though he got it down to $36,000," Abraham said on a Teen Mom OG episode. "And I thought I was going to be paid back."Once she bought the ring, she sort of had no choice but to start wearing it around. Photo: Farrah Abraham Snapchat Photo: Farrah Abraham Snapchat No shade, that's a legendary move. Why not wear your own damn ring that you bought yourself? Advertisement
